title: Opposition demand for Lai to be questioned over special budget 'unconstitutional': Premier
description: The opposition parties' demand that President Lai Ching-te (賴清德) be questioned by lawmakers over a NT$1.25 trillion (US$ 40 billion) special defense budget he proposed is "unconstitutional," Premier Cho Jung-tai (卓榮泰) said Wednesday.
content:
ROC Central News Agency
12/03/2025 07:48 PM
